name: Magic University
description:
Magic University is a 3D puzzle adventure game. Welcome to the magical university, where mysterious walls hide incredible possibilities!

Explore unique locations of the university, solve puzzles and destroy monsters to become a real magician!

As you progress through the levels, you will encounter new challenges that will require you to think creatively. Incredible adventures await you and the opportunity to unleash your true potential in this exciting game!

Game Features:
- Different difficulty levels
- Lots of exciting levels
- Beautiful graphics
- Pleasant music
